abstract: Delegates to annual meetings of three United States churches with millions of members consider adopting resolutions promoted by Boycott, Divest and Sanction movement, global campaign to pressure Israel economically over Palestinian issue.
lead_paragraph: Delegates to the annual gatherings for the United Church of Christ, the Episcopal Church and the Mennonites are expected to vote this week.

headline.main: 3 U.S. Churches Weighing Divestment Resolutions in Support of Palestinians
headline.print_headline: Middle East; U.S. Churches to Vote on Divesting to Pressure Israel Over Occupation

snippet: Delegates to the annual gatherings for the United Church of Christ, the Episcopal Church and the Mennonites are expected to vote this week.
